attributes.action: All NHS Staff shouldn’t pay to park at work!
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS staff are currently under so much stress and are soon to be even more stretched, physically and emotionally. They shouldn’t have to pay for parking!!
attributes.background: Our NHS staff are currently having to pay to park where they work at most UK hospitals! I want it to be made free for them to attend their place of work. Especially during the coronavirus outbreak where their parking costs shouldn’t be something for them to worry about paying!!

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
